I know how to burn a movie that is not the problem but after buring when the movie is ready and i want to wacht the movie on the Ps3 when they are speaking the screen turns too purple when there is no speach it becomes normal again i know how to convert thats also not the probleem WHY IS THE SCREEN TURN INTO PINK/PURPLE PLEASEE SOME ONE WITH KNOWLEDGE ???

@ Reserve   Try burning with a different program and or different kind of CD. Def sounds like something is happening while burning to a DVD. Also if its only happend with the one file, it could mean the file is corrupt abit, try downloading and burning another version or file of the movie. Could also be your PS3, that would suck lol probably not your PS3 tho :) Goodluck..
Why burn it to watch with PS3? Use a flash drive to activate the video up scaling in the PS3 and you will have excellent quality. The quality is not as good if you burn it to watch.
